49662	A dimensional item\nAn item which can be used to change the color of a characters title. Upon leaving a clan, the color title disappears, just as the regular one does (for everyone except Noblesse); however, upon joining a clan and obtaining a new title, the color reappears. After changing the title color, enter '/ resetname command in order to bring back the initial color.
